title: Security Awareness Metrics Reporting
description: A manager must create a dashboard to report on the effectiveness of the security awareness program to leadership.

tasks.description: Identify the key metrics for the program, such as phishing simulation click rates, training completion rates, and user-reported phishing numbers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager selects a good set of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).

tasks.description: Gather the data for these metrics from the relevant systems (phishing platform, LMS, email security gateway).
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully collects all the necessary data.

tasks.description: Create a dashboard that visualizes the trends for these metrics over time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager creates a clear and informative dashboard that effectively communicates the program's performance to leadership.
